title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs Inflow $301M; Ethereum ETFs Outflow Contin | Phemex News
text:
Spot Bitcoin ETFs experienced a significant net inflow of $301 million on September 3, with Ark Invest and 21Sharesâ€™ ARKB being the only exceptions, posting a net outflow. In contrast, spot Ethereum ETFs recorded a net outflow of $38.24 million, continuing a three-day trend of withdrawals.
Spot Bitcoin ETFs See $301 Million Inflow; Ethereum ETFs Face Outflows
